TooGeneral

Class NormalPlatformGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • TooGeneral.NormalPlatformGenerator

  • public class NormalPlatformGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for drawing a platform for the platformer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NormalPlatformGenerator()
      Simple constructor, you do not have to do anything.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getGround()
      Return the image for the ground.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getGround(int depth)
      Return the image for the ground.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlatform()
      Returns the image for the platform.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlatformBottom()
      Returns one of the 3 images for the bottom of the platform.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlatformMiddle()
      Returns one of the 4 random images for the middile of the platform.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlatformTop()
      Returns one of the 4 random images for the top of the platform.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWall()
      Returns image for the wall.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWallBottom()
      Returns one of the 2 images for the bottom of the wall.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWallLeft()
      Return one of the 2 images for the left side of the wall.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWallRight()
      Returns one of the two images for the right of the wall.
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWallTop()
      Returns an image for the top of a wall.

      • getGround

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getGround()
        Return the image for the ground. It is composed of platform top, platform middle and platform bottom.
        Returns:
        Image for the ground.

      • getGround

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getGround(int depth)
        Return the image for the ground. The ground is as deep as you specify it to be. It is composed of platform top, platform middle and platform bottom.
        Parameters:
        depth - How deep the platform should be.
        Returns:
        Image for the ground.

      • getPlatform

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getPlatform()
        Returns the image for the platform. It consists of a combination of platform top and platform bottom.
        Returns:
        Image for the platform.

      • getWall

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getWall()
        Returns image for the wall. It is composed of wall left and wall right.
        Returns:
        Image for the wall.
